coreAttributes.name: Peanut Butter
coreAttributes.description: A jar of homemade, sticky, nut-packed peanut butter. A logo stuck to the side of the jar shows a buxom gorilla-girl in a skimpy chef's outfit with no back, smiling and winking behind her at the consumer, her ass on display while sucking on her finger.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the jar and [npc.verb(breathe)] in the scent of sweet sticky peanut butter. Unable to resist the nutty nectar inside, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] shoveling the butter into [npc.her] mouth until nothing but sweet satisfaction is left behind.
